stress: Try deep breathing for 3 minutes, stretch your body, and drink water.
depression: Talk to someone you trust. Go for a 10-minute walk and write how you feel.
anger: Pause for a few seconds, count backwards from 10, and take 3 deep breaths.
fear: Remind yourself that fear is temporary — focus on slow, deep breathing.
happy: Keep it up! Do one thing that makes you smile again today.
neutral: Even calm days are important — maybe read something light or take a stroll.
